entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who has been coldly responding to Potter's outburst. He mentions giving Potter a 'Babbling Beverage' and warns Crabbe about suffocating Longbottom, which would lead to tedious paperwork.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is the student who has been shouting nonsense at Snape. He seems to be in a state of turmoil after Snape's response.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of Potter's friends, and Snape warns him about suffocating Longbottom, which would lead to paperwork.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is a student who might be in danger of being suffocated by Crabbe's hold.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge seems to be feeling the same way as Potter, and she is talking herself into taking action against him.

relationships.description: Snape scolds Potter for shouting nonsense at him. Snape mentions giving Potter a 'Babbling Beverage' if he continues to shout.
Snape warns Crabbe about suffocating Longbottom, which would lead to paperwork.
Umbridge seems to be confronting Potter, and she is talking herself into taking action against him.
